item.title: FabGL PCEmulator on TTGO VGA32 v1.4
item.author: mc
item.description: After waiting about 3 weeks I finally got my TTGO VGA32 v1.4 from Aliexpress. Immediately, after getting my hands on the device I wanted to test it with FabGL library.
